{"rule":"UPPERCASE_SENTENCE_START","sentence":"^\\Qin-toto provides a concrete technical implementation of a supply chain security system.\\E$"}
{"rule":"UPPERCASE_SENTENCE_START","sentence":"^\\Q\"in-toto\", a Framework for Supply Chain Security\\E$"}
{"rule":"UPPERCASE_SENTENCE_START","sentence":"^\\Qin-toto provides such a wholistic approach and tries to enforce the integrity of the entire supply chain.\\E$"}
{"rule":"UPPERCASE_SENTENCE_START","sentence":"^\\Qin-toto also defines the role of the project owner, which is the entity defining the rules for each step in the supply chain and the root of trust.\\E$"}
{"rule":"UPPERCASE_SENTENCE_START","sentence":"^\\Qin-toto managed supply chain can thus guarantee security goals such as supply chain layout integrity (all steps have been performed in the correct order), artifact flow integrity (artifacts can't be changed in between steps), step authentication (steps can only be performed by the intended parties), implementation transparency (existing supply chains need not be changed) and graceful degradation of security properties, so that in the event of key compromise, not all security properties are lost.\\E$"}
{"rule":"UPPERCASE_SENTENCE_START","sentence":"^\\Qin-toto managed supply chains can thus guarantee security goals such as supply chain layout integrity (all steps have been performed in the correct order), artifact flow integrity (artifacts can't be changed in between steps), step authentication (steps can only be performed by the intended parties), implementation transparency (existing supply chains need not be changed) and graceful degradation of security properties, so that in the event of key compromise, not all security properties are lost.\\E$"}
